caption.p: Effect of marjoram essential oil (EO), chitosan and ascorbic acid (AA) on fresh-cut lettuce ( A) total soluble solids (TSS; %), ( B) total acidity (TA; %), and ( C) sweetness (TSA/TA) after treatment and 6 days storage at 7 °C and 90% RH. On the columns, significant differences ( p < 0.05) among treatments are indicated by different Latin letters; ns indicates no significant differences for different days. Values represent means (±SE) of measurements made on three biological replicates per treatment.
